text: Small, repulsive creatures they were, with black, matted hair and a striking resen blance to the shrunk heads we had gazed at recently; and I have no hesitation in saying that they would have made an end of us but for an intervention so unexpected, so unusual, that only the necessity of rounding my narrative compels me to mention. it. reseuublorce fofe shsuuk heads welad 9oZeol af neeenf QndE leie ce Hef Hey waulot Lace Wade ou eno! of us buf for ou iuferveuha. so unexpeokeol so uuusual fhaf ouf He necessily of rounding syojon Im comjels we fo wenfau it.
name: Aler Coveg
